name: Hover Scrub
tagline: A space-saving presentation plugin for your images
body: ### How to user Hover Scrub Create an image DOM object on your page. ``` ``` Insert your gallery right into the image tag by creating a data-images attribute. ``` ``` Link jQuery and HoverScrub. ``` ``` Activate HoverScrub. ``` ``` OMG, that's it? Yeah!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
